mapper.insert: insert into sys_doctor(doctor_name, doctor_sex, doctor_birthday, doctor_img_path, doctor_speciality, doctor_post, doctor_tel, doctor_company, doctor_home, doctor_email) values(#{doctorName},#{doctorSex},#{doctorBirthday},#{doctorImgPath},#{doctorSpeciality},#{doctorPost},#{doctorTel},#{doctorCompany},#{doctorHome},#{doctorEmail});
